articles.description: Ipswich Town travel to Lincoln City with many players still struggling with illness, said Blues boss Kieran McKenna.
articles.content:
Ipswich Town's first-team squad is continuing to struggle with illness ahead of tomorrow's away fixture at Lincoln City, Kieran McKenna has confirmed. 
The Blues have been dealing with sickness in t… [+2105 chars]
